title: The Love and Sports Series Box Set
description: All's fair in love and sports...  "As a fan of sports-themed romances I've been in love with this series since the first installment with each book as entertaining as the next. Ms. Quinn has crafted a series full of larger than life men who take bromance to a whole new level with interactions that are immensely humorous and make my eyes water with laughter!" - Amazon Reviewer  Take a dramatic ride through the twists and turns of the lives of Jake and his friends as they fight for love, fame and friendship.
author: Meghan Quinn
